channel.title: PINotes latest items feed | See privacy note in description
channel.description: The latest from Proletarian Internationalist Notes -- news, reviews and analysis from a Maoist global perspective | OK for manual browser viewing, but DO NOT subscribe if you don't know what you're doing or don't understand the security issues. If you usually use an onion router or proxy, make sure it is on as soon as your aggregator/browser/reader starts. Make sure both your connection and your device are as secure as you need them to be after studying the issues.
